title: Chancery
content:
Exact match, please. Thanks!

author: Renaissance Man

comments.content:
Exquisit. Hard to tell which weight from the sample.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/poppl-exquisit-bq/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907032115/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/poppl-exquisit-bq/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/poppl-exquisit-bq/")

Thanks for a quick ID!

The letterforms sure look like a match, but Exquisit has much higher contrast. It’s probably just the poor sample.
